p: In the combined intervention group, 144 participants (98.0%) attended the first individual session, 133 (90.5%) attended at least 3 sessions, and 112 (76.2%) attended all 6 individual sessions. In addition, 123 (83.7%) attended at least 1 optional group session, and 112 (76.2%) attended all 3 optional group sessions. Individual sessions lasted a mean of 51 minutes (range, 29-76 minutes), and group sessions lasted a mean of 65 minutes (range, 60-70 minutes).
